Bagaimanakah mereka terselamat daripada krisis hidup-dan-mati ini dengan 160,000 rakyat?

programme.title: Two Cops Ep9
programme.desc: Cha Dong Tak ialah seorang polis yang mempunyai rasa keadilan yang kuat. Pada suatu hari semasa memburu seorang penjenayah, tubuhnya secara tidak dapat dijelaskan telah dirasuk oleh jiwa seorang penipu yang licik Gong Soo Chang. Dua jiwa antagonis berakhir dalam perkongsian penyelesaian jenayah yang pelik. Keadaan menjadi lebih rumit apabila seorang wartawan impulsif, Song Ji An, menyertai siasatan.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep2
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah bagaimana Imran berjaya membuktikan kebolehan magiknya kepada Maira iaitu seorang remaja perempuan yang terlebih dahulu dibawah jagaan nenek Imran kerana ibunya bekerja di Kuala Lumpur. Maira menceritakan kebolehan Imran kepada rakan-rakannya Haikal dan Zara yang tidak sangka kebolehan Imran itu kemudiannya mendapat tarikan khalayak kampung yang sanggup membayar untuk menyaksi pertunjukannya ketika dia berada di kedai Pak Salim. Dalam perjalanan pulang mereka berempat telah melihat lintasan cahaya diruang angkasa yang kemudiannya menyebabkan mereka demam.

programme.title: The Sacred Riana: Beginning
programme.desc: Pada zaman kanak-kanaknya, Riana tinggal di sebuah pekan kecil bersama ayah dan ibunya yang menjalankan perniagaan rumah pengebumian. Musibah yang datang memerlukan mereka berpindah ke rumah Pakcik Johan di Jakarta dan Riana bertemu dengan anak patung Riani. Riana semakin dewasa dan suatu hari telah dilawati oleh Puan Klara, seorang guru kaunselor di sekolahnya yang ingin mengetahui sebab Riana tidak hadir ke sekolah dan mencadangkan Riana untuk dipulihkan. Musibah menimpa ibu bapa Riana. Puan Klara datang lagi bersama Hendro, Lusi dan Anggi, untuk membantu Riana beramah mesra. Tetapi, kehadiran mereka mencetuskan masalah yang lebih besar.

programme.title: Bayi Tabung
programme.desc: Setelah mengharungi satu peristiwa yang menghimpit kehidupan, Jelina ditawarkan untuk menyewakan rahimnya dengan bayaran tinggi oleh sepasang suami isteri dari Malaysia yang tidak punya anak secara biasa. Tawaran harga yang tinggi membuatkan Jelina bersetuju untuk menerima titipan embrio itu sehingga lahir. Setelah bayi itu lahir timbul pula satu masalah kerana Jelina merasa bahawa bayi itu adalah darah dagingnya.

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Setelah berhijrah, Hasnah/Ana bertemu seorang lelaki dan menjalin hubungan bersamanya - namun dia sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai anak sebaya dengannya.

programme.title: Bintang Malam
programme.desc: Selepas dua belas tahun berlayar, Yazid dan Johari akhirnya pulang semula ke tanah air. Yazid pulang ke kampung manakala Johari pergi ke Kuala Lumpur dan bertemu Haslinda, Shima dan Aida. Bersimpati dengan nasib Haslinda, Johari ingin membantunya. Yazid pula keluar mencari Aisah di bandar - tetapi berdepan dengan pelbagai konflik dan tragedi.

programme.title: Bayangan Cinta
programme.desc: Pertemuan dua bekas kekasih, Auzy dan Akhbar selepas 18 tahun membangkitkan perasaan lama. Walau perasaan cinta masih kuat, hubungan mereka tidak dapat diteruskan kerana Akhbar sudah pun berkahwin. Suratan takdir mengatakan sebaliknya apabila Auzy kini mengajar anak kepada Akhbar, Andy.

programme.title: Simfoni Duniaku
programme.desc: Iskandar, pemuda yang suka berfoya-foya akhirnya merasai kebahagiaan alam percintaan. Perkenalannya bersama Zuraida telah membuatkan dia jatuh cinta. Namun, terpaksa berdepan rintangan apabila Iskandar telah dijodohkan bersama anak perempuan kepada rakan niaga bapanya. Liku-liku percintaan dan tentangan terpaksa dihadapi oleh dua pasangan bercinta.

programme.title: Ali Setan
programme.desc: Ali pelajar universiti yang nakal dan suka bergurau berjumpa Asmidar ketika dalam perjalanan ke universiti. Ali selalu mencari jalan untuk mengusik Asmidar, lama kelamaan perasaan cinta mula berputik antara mereka berdua. Konflik mula terjadi apabila Ali sebenarnya sudah berkahwin dengan Tipah namun atas sebab terpaksa.

programme.title: Dewi Cinta
programme.desc: Patah hati kerana teman lelakinya curang, Dewi cuba untuk membunuh diri. Sebelum terlambat, Dewi segera menyedari bahawa usahanya itu hanyalah sia-sia. Dia bertemu dengan Arman lalu mereka berdua jatuh cinta dan menjalinkan hubungan. Bekas teman lelaki Dewi, Micky muncul kembali menagih cinta darinya kerana masih tidak boleh melupakan Dewi. Pilihan terpaksa dibuat antara Arman atau Micky.

programme.title: Rentak Desa
programme.desc: Pencemaran alam menyebabkan penduduk kampung mula menunjuk perasaan. Mat Desa dan Wairah seringkali berasa bahawa penduduk di situ hanya hidup atas empati pemaju. Hanya kerana ingin membuat jalan raya, bukit dan pokok ditebang manakala sungai dicemari sisa bahan toksik - menyebabkan ikan mati dan beracun. Sebuah penemuan merungkai segalanya.

programme.title: Bintang Malam
programme.desc: Selepas dua belas tahun berlayar, Yazid dan Johari akhirnya pulang semula ke tanah air. Yazid pulang ke kampung manakala Johari pergi ke Kuala Lumpur dan bertemu Haslinda, Shima dan Aida. Bersimpati dengan nasib Haslinda, Johari ingin membantunya. Yazid pula keluar mencari Aisah di bandar - tetapi berdepan dengan pelbagai konflik dan tragedi.

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Setelah berhijrah, Hasnah/Ana bertemu seorang lelaki dan menjalin hubungan bersamanya - namun dia sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai anak sebaya dengannya.

programme.title: Tuan Besar
programme.desc: Tuan Wahid sering menggunakan darjat untuk bersikap kasar dengan pekerjanya dan mengambil kesempatan terhadap Rokiah. Rokiah, seorang janda mempunyai anak bernama Jamilah. Jamil, anak Tuan Wahid pula jatuh cinta dengan Jamilah. Ini menimbulkan konflik antara mereka berdua lalu datang Tuan Besar untuk menyelesaikan konflik itu.

programme.title: Ali Setan
programme.desc: Ali pelajar universiti yang nakal dan suka bergurau berjumpa Asmidar ketika dalam perjalanan ke universiti. Ali selalu mencari jalan untuk mengusik Asmidar, lama kelamaan perasaan cinta mula berputik antara mereka berdua. Konflik mula terjadi apabila Ali sebenarnya sudah berkahwin dengan Tipah namun atas sebab terpaksa.

programme.title: Memori
programme.desc: Seorang Dato yang berpengaruh bersama dua orang anaknya yang mempunyai masalah tersendiri. Anak perempuannya bergelut dengan dunia dadah manakala anak lelakinya terlampau menyukai dunia permotoran sehingga obses akan perkara itu. Kehilangan bapa mereka akhirnya menimbulkan rasa sesal dalam diri mereka.

programme.title: Bayangan Cinta
programme.desc: Pertemuan dua bekas kekasih, Auzy dan Akhbar selepas 18 tahun membangkitkan perasaan lama. Walau perasaan cinta masih kuat, hubungan mereka tidak dapat diteruskan kerana Akhbar sudah pun berkahwin. Suratan takdir mengatakan sebaliknya apabila Auzy kini mengajar anak kepada Akhbar, Andy.

programme.title: Dewi Cinta
programme.desc: Patah hati kerana teman lelakinya curang, Dewi cuba untuk membunuh diri. Sebelum terlambat, Dewi segera menyedari bahawa usahanya itu hanyalah sia-sia. Dia bertemu dengan Arman lalu mereka berdua jatuh cinta dan menjalinkan hubungan. Bekas teman lelaki Dewi, Micky muncul kembali menagih cinta darinya kerana masih tidak boleh melupakan Dewi. Pilihan terpaksa dibuat antara Arman atau Micky.

programme.title: Permintaan Terakhir
programme.desc: Salina terpaksa menjalani kehidupan baharu setelah ibunya berkahwin dengan bapa kepada Rohani yang merupakan musuh Salina di sekolah. Salina terpaksa mencari jalan untuk mendapat perhatian keluarganya. Keadaan ini berlanjutan sehingga dia mendapat tahu dirinya menghidap penyakit barah otak. Salina merahsiakan perkara ini daripada keluarganya, namun ia terbongkar setelah Rohani terdengar doa yang dibaca Salina.

programme.title: Bayi Tabung
programme.desc: Setelah mengharungi satu peristiwa yang menghimpit kehidupan, Jelina ditawarkan untuk menyewakan rahimnya dengan bayaran tinggi oleh sepasang suami isteri dari Malaysia yang tidak punya anak secara biasa. Tawaran harga yang tinggi membuatkan Jelina bersetuju untuk menerima titipan embrio itu sehingga lahir. Setelah bayi itu lahir timbul pula satu masalah kerana Jelina merasa bahawa bayi itu adalah darah dagingnya.

programme.title: Suara Kekasih
programme.desc: Percintaan yang ditentang keluarga kerana perbezaan darjat membuatkan Ayu dan Taufiq terpaksa membawa haluan berbeza. Ayu, penyanyi di kelab malam jatuh cinta dengan Taufiq, pengurus syarikat insuran yang berasal dari keluarga kaya. Ditentang oleh ibu Taufiq, mereka merasakan restu keluarga amat penting dan terpaksa membuat keputusan penting untuk masa depan mereka.

programme.title: Simfoni Duniaku
programme.desc: Iskandar, pemuda yang suka berfoya-foya akhirnya merasai kebahagiaan alam percintaan. Perkenalannya bersama Zuraida telah membuatkan dia jatuh cinta. Namun, terpaksa berdepan rintangan apabila Iskandar telah dijodohkan bersama anak perempuan kepada rakan niaga bapanya. Liku-liku percintaan dan tentangan terpaksa dihadapi oleh dua pasangan bercinta.

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Kehilangan bapa mereka akhirnya menimbulkan rasa sesal dalam diri mereka.

programme.title: Bintang Malam
programme.desc: Selepas dua belas tahun berlayar, Yazid dan Johari akhirnya pulang semula ke tanah air. Yazid pulang ke kampung manakala Johari pergi ke Kuala Lumpur dan bertemu Haslinda, Shima dan Aida. Bersimpati dengan nasib Haslinda, Johari ingin membantunya. Yazid pula keluar mencari Aisah di bandar - tetapi berdepan dengan pelbagai konflik dan tragedi.

programme.title: Simfoni Duniaku
programme.desc: Iskandar, pemuda yang suka berfoya-foya akhirnya merasai kebahagiaan alam percintaan. Perkenalannya bersama Zuraida telah membuatkan dia jatuh cinta. Namun, terpaksa berdepan rintangan apabila Iskandar telah dijodohkan bersama anak perempuan kepada rakan niaga bapanya. Liku-liku percintaan dan tentangan terpaksa dihadapi oleh dua pasangan bercinta.

programme.title: Rentak Desa
programme.desc: Pencemaran alam menyebabkan penduduk kampung mula menunjuk perasaan. Mat Desa dan Wairah seringkali berasa bahawa penduduk di situ hanya hidup atas empati pemaju. Hanya kerana ingin membuat jalan raya, bukit dan pokok ditebang manakala sungai dicemari sisa bahan toksik - menyebabkan ikan mati dan beracun. Sebuah penemuan merungkai segalanya.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk di suatu setingan diganggu hantu. Mereka berkerja sama untuk mencari jalan penyelesaian. Akhirnya mereka berjaya menghalau hantu daripada menggangu setinggan mereka.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Jodoh Express
programme.desc: Maya, seorang ketua agensi mencari jodoh yang berusaha menyatukan pelanggan-pelanggannya dengan gadis atau jejaka idaman mereka. Suatu hari, agensi mereka telah didatangi seorang pelanggan wanita, Ros yang ingin menggunakan perkhidmatan mereka untuk memikat seorang gadis bernama Qalisha untuk adik lelakinya, Akmal. Namun, tanpa disangka rupa-rupanya Akmal adalah lelaki yang disukai oleh Maya dalam diam.

programme.title: Tmo Bro Nampak Motor Gua
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Bro Nampak Motor Gua

programme.title: Love Me Tomorrow
programme.desc: perjalanan cinta seorang lelaki berumur 30 tahun yang bekerja sebagai DJ kelab malam dengan seorang wanita yang berusia 50 tahun. Perhubungan mereka tidak direstui oleh anak wanita tersebut. Wanita tersebut amat berjaya didalam kerjayanya sebagai pereka fesyen membuatkan lelaki merasa rendah diri.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Amran seorang budak Delivery yang gemar berlumba secara haram motor Drag. Satu hari selepas memenagi satu perlumbaan, Amran telah di hadiahkan seorang perempuan bernama Maya sebagai habuan perlumbaan. Malang tidak berbau, mereka telah kemalangan dan Maya mati ditempat kejadian.

programme.title: Untuk Angeline
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri terpaksa menyerahkan bayi perempuan mereka kepada pasangan lain kerana tidak mampu untuk membiayai kos perubatan hospital semasa bayi itu dilahirkan . Anak perempuan itu sangat disayangi oleh bapa angkatnya sehingga dicemburui oleh abang angkat dan ibu angkatnya . Namun setelah bapa angkatnya meninggal dunia, kanak-kanak perempuan itu mula dilayan dengan buruk oleh ibu angkatnya

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Gang Preed
programme.desc: Kisah pelajar sekolah menengah yang sangat meminati filem seram. Mo adalah pengarah dan juga mengetuai kumpulan kecil ini. Suatu hari Mo terserempak dengan Prang, seorang gadis misteri yang dipindahkan dari sekolah lain. Mo memberitahu rakan-rakannya bahawa dia benar-benar mahukan dia sebagai peneraju filem baharunya. Masalah antara pembuat filem yang buruk dan gadis pelik bermula, bersama dengan persahabatan dan cinta yang mula mekar tanpa mereka sedari.

programme.title: Di Pintu Syurga
programme.desc: Jannah disuruh untuk bernikah dengan Faris oleh ibu bapanya. Faris adalah seorang guru seni khat. Suatu malam, Jannah terlibat dalam kemalangan yang mengakibatkan dia mengalami amnesia. Jannah jatuh cinta dengan Faris, yang dianggap sebagai seorang lelaki yang sempurna dan layak menjadi imamnya suatu hari nanti. Sikap Jannah juga sudah berubah. Namun, kebahagiaan yang dimiliki mereka tidak kekal lama.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep8
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: Mengisahkan enam sekawan yang saling mengenali melalui laman sosial ‘chatroom’. Mereka ada satu persamaan iaitu pernah mengalami trauma dalam hidup. Mereka memutuskan untuk bertemu dan mengambil percutian bersama. Pada malam itu mereka mula berkongsi tentang perkara yang membuatkan mereka menjadi trauma. Kejadian aneh berlaku dan mereka tidak dapat keluar dari banglo itu.

programme.title: Happy Birth Death
programme.desc: Sekumpulan teman wanita menyewa rumah agam untuk majlis hari jadi, hanya untuk mencari tetamu yang tidak diundang.

programme.title: Janji Gak Naksir ART
programme.desc: Berminat dengan pembantu peribadi tidak salah, lebih-lebih lagi jika anda mempunyai pengawal peribadi seperti Jaka. Dia kaya, kacak, baik hati, dan pandai buat kerja rumah juga!

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep83
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep6
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Konser Hepi Sampai Pagi
programme.desc: Nikmati keseronokan bersama dengan menyanyi dan bergoyang di Konser Hepi Sampai Pagi bersama barisan bintang terkenal dan hos yang mengujakan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep84
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Sungguh Sulit Untuk Di Skip
programme.desc: Ririn berasa jengkel kerana Udin dan teman wanitanya beratur untuk memohon kerja. Akibatnya, Ririn tidak diterima di syarikat itu. Ririn keliru bagaimana untuk bertahan. Dia berpura-pura menjadi isteri Udin di hadapan ibunya dan sebaliknya dibawa ke kampung halaman Udin.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep9
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep14
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Malam Puncak HUT SCTV 32Xtraordinary Ep2
programme.desc: Menyambut Ulang Tahun ke-32! SCTV Xtraordinary menampilkan persembahan yang menakjubkan dengan kerjasama artis Indonesia yang lain.

programme.title: Sungguh Sulit Untuk Di Skip
programme.desc: Ririn berasa jengkel kerana Udin dan teman wanitanya beratur untuk memohon kerja. Akibatnya, Ririn tidak diterima di syarikat itu. Ririn keliru bagaimana untuk bertahan. Dia berpura-pura menjadi isteri Udin di hadapan ibunya dan sebaliknya dibawa ke kampung halaman Udin.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep33
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep9
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep84
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep35

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep49
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Suami Hanya Mau Bersama Saat Suka, Bukan Dalam Susah
programme.desc: Fandy memilih untuk meninggalkan isterinya Hana dan lebih memilih Mila demi kehidupan yang bahagia, daripada tinggal bersama Hana.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep21
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29182919
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep923924
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29182919
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1781
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3542
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2559
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep379
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1989
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep379
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80’s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition – to live the American dream.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: A young policeman goes undercover to try and capture a criminal group specializing in mobile fraud who has swindled hundreds of millions of yuan from business tycoons and ordinary people.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: “In the Mood for Love” is Wong Kar-Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses are having an affair.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of “The Way We Dance” features the plight of Hong Kong’s grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government’s plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Peace Breaker
programme.desc: Police officer Gao accidentally kills a pedestrian on the way to his mother's funeral. He tries to dispose the body by hiding it in his mother's coffin. As the pedestrian turns out to be a wanted person and a police officer witnessed the accident, Gao is forced to bring his body back to the police station. Can the case be settled so easily?

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nation’s Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Liu’s family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China’s deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng (Wu Jing), returns into action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorizing innocent civilians.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to “Casino Tycoon”. 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down…

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Lady Is The Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brother’s death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow” is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar “Drunken Cat” who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kong’s entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin find themselves and their martial arts schools pitted against another rival school and the expert they hire, Master Shan. This is a masterpiece of Director Liu Chia Liang and one of the top ten movies in 1981.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao (Chen Chia-chi) is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun (Wang Jung), the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi (Chao Kuo) - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang (Liu Yung) to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth...

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Cat Vs Rat
programme.desc: Jien Chiu and Bai Yu Tong are equally matched rivals in martial arts. Bai saves the emperor one day but did not believe his identity. Jien rescues the emperor later and gets promoted to the royal guard. This angers Bai and he attempts to jeopardize Jien’s position by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Jien is able to reclaim the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Desingu Raja
programme.desc: A love story with boy and girl from feuding villages.

programme.title: Anandham Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Veerame Vaagai Soodum
programme.desc: A normal man from a middle-class family questioning the authorities for abusing their powers.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A reporter along with his girlfriend joins hands with young social activists to fight against a factory whose chemical emissions greatly damage a village.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Jai Hind 2
programme.desc: One man's fight to give good education to the poor.

programme.title: En Peyar Surya En Veedu India (2.5 Hrs)
programme.desc: A soldier aspiring to be posted at the LOC suffers from anger management issues, due to which he gets court-martialled. He then sets out to meet a psychologist whose approval can get him back on duty.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Ignoring her misgivings, a young woman purchases a vintage car, which seems to have a mind of its own. Further investigation reveals that it is possessed by a vengeful spirit with ties to her past.

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Desingu Raja
programme.desc: A love story with boy and girl from feuding villages.

programme.title: Ka Pe Ranasingam
programme.desc: The story is about politics surrounding land and the plight of farmers. It showed Vijay helping poor farmers in their fight against the industries that have acquired their lands.

programme.title: Sowcarpettai
programme.desc: A young couple is all set to get married, but an evil businessman and his henchmen brutally kill them. The lovers then return as spirits to exact revenge on their perpetrators.

programme.title: Aghavan
programme.desc: A police officer works undercover in Brihadeeswarar Temple in Thanjavur to protect its treasure from criminals who plan to loot the temple.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Kabadari
programme.desc: Shakti, a traffic policeman, wishes to work on criminal cases. His wish comes true when he stumbles upon three skeletons and decides to investigate the matter despite his senior's opposition.

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Blade, a henchman for a local gangster, Naaga, falls in love with Vidhya, the daughter of a factory owner. He has to choose between supporting her father and his boss, who are rivals.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Mirch Masala
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Cbi 5
programme.desc: After a series of murders take place one after another, a police officer decides to investigate the case himself and bring the killer to justice.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Eli
programme.desc: Eli is a skilled trickster who manages to fool the police and escape from their clutches several times. Due to his abilities, a retired policeman seeks his help to solve a crime.

programme.title: Ustad Hotel
programme.desc: Faizi, an aspiring chef, returns to his hometown in India when he fails to receive support from his father. He tries to fulfil his dream by helping his grandfather, Kareem, run his hotel.

programme.title: Maara
programme.desc: A young woman named Paaru notices a painting on the walls of a coastal town that depicts a fairy tale she once heard as a child. Intrigued, she sets out to find the person who painted it.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: Durairaj, an alcoholic professor, is enrolled as a teacher at a juvenile centre. Once there, he learns about the misdoings of Bhavani, a gangster, and decides to face him.

programme.desc: Host Jiiva indulges various celebrities in a series of bidding-cum-quiz rounds as they compete against each other to win the competition.

programme.desc: Jo Koy's star continues to rise in his second feature-length, uncensored stand-up special, Lights Out.

programme.title: Dinner For Schmucks
programme.desc: There's only one thing keeping aspiring executive from corporate success. Find the perfect guest to bring to his boss's monthly dinner party where winner is the one who arrives with the biggest buffoon.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: More Now - Pride is adamant the elusive 'Baitfish' has returned and, in attempt to locate his nemesis, he has the team investigate crime scenes and chase leads from New Orleans to Charleston, SC.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The Serene Squall - While on a dangerous humanitarian mission, the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise stumbles into a harrowing game of leverage with the quadrant's deadliest space pirate.

programme.title: Mr. Mayor (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Titi B. - Neil accidentally angers mega-influencer Titi B. and must apologize or deal with the wrath of her followers. Jayden coaches Arpi on how to be less abrasive at personal appearances.

programme.title: 1883 (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: This Is Not Your Heaven - James and Margaret face a heavy decision. Shea and Thomas take bold action to help one of their own.

programme.title: All My Loving
programme.desc: Three siblings, Stefan, Julia and Tobias, all reach crossroads in their lives, where something must change before the rest of their lives begin. Through chaos, mistakes, and insecurities, they search for a path to happiness.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Giuseppe is a priest who’s replacing the bishop of a small town near Naples. He is given the dangerous task of prohibiting the illegal dumping of industrial waste by the mafia. But his spiritual faith is tested as the dangers of his task start mounting.

programme.title: Irina
programme.desc: Stuck in poverty and desperate to make ends meet, Irina decides to become a surrogate mother. As the baby grows inside her, she must accept that she will have to part with it forever, and she discovers what it means to love and forgive.

programme.title: Jeune Juliette
programme.desc: In this bubbly teenage drama, Juliette is a high school sophomore who has big dreams about friends, love and family. However, as each dream fails to materialise despite her best efforts, she learns to let go and find peace with who she really is

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: Ramon, an anti-bullying advocate, returns to his alma mater to give a talk on bullying. There, he recounts his past experiences with bullying, which still haunt him to this day.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: All My Loving
programme.desc: Three siblings, Stefan, Julia and Tobias, all reach crossroads in their lives, where something must change before the rest of their lives begin. Through chaos, mistakes, and insecurities, they search for a path to happiness.

programme.title: Irina

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
programme.desc: In Tuscany, Polish Nobel Prize winner Maria's stable family life begins to erode as her relationship with a young immigrant develops against a backdrop of terrorism and eroding democracy.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: Ramon, an anti-bullying advocate, returns to his alma mater to give a talk on bullying. There, he recounts his past experiences with bullying, which still haunt him to this day.

programme.title: Patchwork Family

programme.title: Don't Forget To Breathe
programme.desc: Klemen adores his older brother, Peter. When Peter becomes distracted with his affair with the beautiful Sonja, Klemen is angry that he’s been cast aside. At the same time, he struggles to ignore his growing obsession with Sonja’s feminine sensuality.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Discovering Mandy
programme.desc: Hot young designer, Mia, is a lowly dressmaker’s daughter who has worked hard to succeed in the cutthroat fashion world. However, her world crashes when her famous mentor abandons her suddenly and she is Mandy again, being forced to return to her roots.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Machine Hearts
programme.desc: It is the year 2065, and robots and automation have threatened to replace all remaining jobs. However, Edwin the mechanic, refuses to accept this state of things.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: Machine Hearts
programme.desc: It is the year 2065, and robots and automation have threatened to replace all remaining jobs. However, Edwin the mechanic, refuses to accept this state of things.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: Discovering Mandy
programme.desc: Hot young designer, Mia, is a lowly dressmaker’s daughter who has worked hard to succeed in the cutthroat fashion world. However, her world crashes when her famous mentor abandons her suddenly and she is Mandy again, being forced to return to her roots.

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: The Winner And I
programme.desc: Carolin is a geriatric nurse and single mother who is stuck with heavy debt. When she finds a 5 million winning lottery ticket, her honest nature prompts her to find its owner. However, things get tricky when the whole town finds out about her “win”.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg
programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 8
programme.desc: When a container with a shady past lands on the auction block, Mo & Ty are ready to go all in. Will their big risk pay off? Or will their high hopes go up in smoke?

programme.title: Gotham S1 4
programme.desc: Gordon and Bullock must protect the City Council as a contentious Council vote on the future of the Arkham District approaches and politicians on both sides are in danger.

programme.title: Friends S6 1
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel wake up with hangovers--and married. Chandler and Monica don't get married, but he asks her if he can move in with her instead.

programme.title: Friends S6 2
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica tell Joey and Rachel that they want to live together. Monica is hurt that Rachel doesn't react as strongly as Joey. Phoebe tries to find out how Ross really feels about Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 3
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Friends S6 4
programme.desc: Injured Joey must get an acting part in order to qualify for health insurance. Rachel finally learns the truth about her marriage to Ross.

programme.title: Friends S6 5
programme.desc: Joey pretends to be the owner of a Porsche whose owner left his keys at Central Perk. Rachel and Ross get divorced. Chandler and Monica babysit Phoebe's triplets.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 3
programme.desc: Pull back the curtain on 20 of the dumbest performers ever to take the stage - from an angry Elmo to a lion trainer who almost becomes dinner and a woman who crushes watermelons. They all get harsh reviews from celebrities like Danny Bonaduce and Leif Garrett, plus hot comics like Mike Trainor.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 4
programme.desc: Feel the adrenaline rush with 20 of the dumbest daredevils ever caught on film. We've got base jumpers, bull riders, tightrope walkers, even an alligator wrangler. And they all have one thing in common - hilarious fails. With hair-raising commentaryfrom our celebrity cast, including Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges and Chelsea Peretti.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 11
programme.desc: When the Legends are transported to a cosmic bowling alley, Spooner makes a bet against the reigning champs without knowing what they’re up against.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr and Sal get themselves into some hairy predicaments at the beauty supply store. Then, they discover that a language barrier adds to the awkwardness during a text message challenge in Time's Square. And later, a panel of esteemed educators offers no help to tonight's stammering loser.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 5
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q spread the love as attendants in a bridal dress shop much to the dismay of the brides-to-be, and break a sacred guy-code in the process. Plus, they attempt to sway frightened focus groups with fragrance campaigns that truly stink. Then the punishment takes an unexpected and never before seen twist when the big loser wonders if he's too old to get a visit from the tooth fairy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 6
programme.desc: It's spa day for the Jokers, although for them it's anything but relaxing. Then at the park, Sal reveals his secret identity while discussing the "birds-and-bees" of dolphins. Plus, surprised strangers wish they could have their "penny" back for sharing their thoughts. Finally, the big loser finds himself a little over dressed, and at the last minute has the runway pulled out from under him.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 7
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Sal and Q network their way into some very uncomfortable business conversations, and go head to head in a photography presentation that's anything but picture perfect. Then, the clock is ticking during a time sensitive challenge in the park. And finally, tonight's big loser thinks he can sing and dance his way out of his punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: The Jokers make some tough calls at a telemarketing agency that leave everyone wondering if they're just phoning it in. Then the guys' intentions get wishy-washy at a fountain in the mall. Plus, Q and Sal tap into their spiritual side when they catchsome dreams down at the shore. And the big loser of the night has his tour dampened by the other Jokers.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr take to the court to serve up some seriously personal tennis lessons, and then head to the park for a bewildering game of Now! And tonight's loser must put his face through the ultimate test during a food presentation!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 5
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. This perp walk includes a drunk driving squirrel, nude news crasher, grand theft puppy, and a stick-up woman whose bra is packing. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 8
programme.desc: With intense emotions lingering after their mission, Mary and John stay close to home to watch over Samuel Campbell. Carlos is forced to face his past. Millie helps Samuel recover.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 01
programme.desc: What did she say? Amy (MAYIM BIALIK) answers Sheldon's marriage proposal in the eleventh season premiere. Meanwhile, Howard & Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 02
programme.desc: Leonard's job is at stake when he gives an embarrassing radio interview which angers the university and the entire physics community. NPR Host IRA FLATOW returns as himself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 03
programme.desc: Amy records Sheldon talking in his sleep and tries to convince him he can be more easygoing. Meanwhile Raj and Stuart compete to win the heart of Bernadette's coworker.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 04
programme.desc: While Howard and Sheldon bond over their relationships with their disappointing fathers Leonard's mom (CHRISTINE BARANSKI) finds a new best friend in Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 05
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny learn new tactics for dealing with Sheldon from an unlikely source. Meanwhile, Raj & Sheldon can't handle Amy working together with Howard.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 15
programme.desc: To her surprise, Veronica works as a "love detective" when she's asked to track down her friend Meg's (recurring guest star ALONA TAL) secret admirer and a Russian bride's estranged fiancé. Meanwhile, after discovering that a credit card belongingto Lynn Echolls, who apparently committed suicide recently, is being used, Veronica and Logan go to a Los Angeles hotel in hopes of finding either her or a clue. Recurring guest star ALYSON HANNIGAN ("Buffy The Vampire Slayer") appears as Logan's half sister Trina Echolls.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 16
programme.desc: Following an emotional reunion with her mother, Veronica is hired to track down Neptune High's beloved mascot, Polly the Parrot, which was apparently kidnapped by a rival school on the eve of a big basketball game. Meanwhile, with her suspicions about the Kane family rekindled, Veronica attempts to gain access to her father's original interrogation tapes. Later, Veronica's relationship with Deputy Leo (recurring guest star MAX GREENFIELD) intensifies, as does Meg's (recurring guest star ALONA TAL) relationship with Duncan.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 17
programme.desc: As she continues investigating Lilly Kane's murder, Veronica pursues a risky lead that could discredit Abel Koontz's (not appearing in this episode) confession when she discovers that the convicted killer has a daughter, Amelia DeLongpre (ERIN CHAMBERS), who is about to receive a huge payoff from Jake Kane (recurring guest star KYLE SECOR). Logan stumbles onto Veronica's detailed computer files of everyone connected to Lilly's death. At school, Veronica is hired by a senior student, Sabrina(MEGAN HENNING), to find the party responsible for tormenting her in an attempt to sabotage Sabrina's chances at becoming valedictorian. Sabrina is not well liked by most of her peers, and the long list of suspects includes her ex-boyfriend and herclosest competitor. Meanwhile, unsavory, rival private investigator Vinnie Vanlowe (KEN MARINO) makes Keith a business offer.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 18
programme.desc: A series of fire drills leads Veronica to the discovery that Neptune High has been receiving bomb threats. She enlists Wallace and Mac's (recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO) help to investigate classmates who could pose a serious threat to the school, including new student Ben (JONATHAN TAYLOR THOMAS - "Home Improvement," "Smallville"). Meanwhile, Keith stuns Veronica with the news of whom he's been secretly dating. Later, Duncan confronts Veronica about her ongoing investigation into hissister's death. JOEY LAUREN ADAMS ("Chasing Amy") guest stars as Ms. Stafford, a new substitute journalism teacher.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 19
programme.desc: While helping a classmate search for her missing terrier, Veronica stumbles onto a bigger mystery, which affects pets all over Neptune, California. Meanwhile, tensions mount in the Echolls family as Trina (recurring guest star ALYSON HANNIGAN) tries to convince the now retired Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) to accept a role in her new boyfriend's independent movie. Later, Weevil is arrested for breaking into the Kane residence and stealing something from the deceased Lilly's room.

programme.title: Gossip Girl S1 1
programme.desc: Once the Upper East Side's most notorious party girl, Serena keeps her reasons for returning mysterious, although they may have something to do with her younger brother, Eric.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 11
programme.desc: While Lena visits her mother’s birthplace in Ireland, Supergirl and the team learn Nyxly’s dark history from a familiar face from the past… Mr. Mxyptlk (THOMAS LENNON).

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 20
programme.desc: When a classmate's boyfriend threatens to post a humiliating video of his girlfriend online if she breaks up with him, Veronica helps her concoct a vengeful scheme if he doesn't allow the relationship to end peacefully. Meanwhile, Keith searches for Duncan after his parents post a huge reward for information on his whereabouts. Later, as her secret new relationship intensifies, Veronica learns a disturbing fact about the night that she was drugged and assaulted. Recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN appears as Aaron Echolls, and recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO portrays Mac.

programme.title: The Flash S7 14
programme.desc: When Ultraviolet returns to Central City, Allegra is determined to find her cousin and change her heart. Meanwhile, Joe finds evidence that Kristen Kramer may not be the good cop she appears to be.

programme.title: Arrow S1 15
programme.desc: Oliver asks Detective McKenna Hall on a date, while a jewel thief named Dodger (JAMES CALLIS) strikes Starling City and targets someone close to Oliver.

programme.desc: While Thony (ELODIE YUNG) is given a dire ultimatum by Garrett that could compromise her son’s access to medical care, Arman calls into question his real role within the family.
